## VerifyDeployArgs interface

Config to initialize a Verify contract with.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VerifyDeployArgs 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [admin](./rain-sdk.verifydeployargs.admin.md) | string | The address to ASSIGN ALL ADMIN ROLES to initially. This address is free and encouraged to delegate fine grained permissions to many other sub-admin addresses, then revoke it's own "root" access. |
|  [callback](./rain-sdk.verifydeployargs.callback.md) | string | The address of the <code>IVerifyCallback</code> contract if it exists. MAY be <code>address(0)</code> to signify that callbacks should NOT run. |
